resources.string:
Instructions to be followed. 

 >>>click on the star icon to know about the Developer! 

 *After Installing the app, Grant App permissions to send sms and access Location. 
 *Go to start, Enter the name and contact number of people whom you want to notify during emergency. 
 *click on save . To verify, view the entered details. 
 *If you want to delete any number, enter the name of the person and click on delete.
 *During emergency open the App. It asks If you are safe? Click on NO and continue.
 *click on send sms - to send an emergency message only (if location is off).
 *click on send location - to send an emergency message with location.
 *App successfully sends sms to the registered contacts.
 *It requires minimum balance to send sms and internet connection with location On.


 We Deserve to be safe ..... 

 Stay Safe! Stay Happy!
